name: Beer Bites
tag_list: beer-bites, bar-snack, bar, pub, snack, restaurant, beer, cheese
overview:
BEER BITES – Bar Snack Food Startup Business – Partners Wanted

PRODUCT: A novel, hip, trendy, conversation-starting product in the salty snack, bar snacks, brewing, hotel & hospitality space.

CONCEPT: Proven concept in Europe, product has yet to reach prime US market. A CONFIDENTIAL Business Plan is available upon request & signed NDA/NC agreement.

OPPORTUNITY: Little innovation has occurred in the bar snacks vertical – not only are the typical pretzels, nuts, and snack mixes served at a bar or restaurant lounge boring and unexciting – they are infamously unsanitary! Bar-top bowls have proven to fester among the highest bacterium counts anywhere. “Beer Bites” provides a win-win for the customer & establishment where the purveyor converts a cost-center to a revenue-stream and the customer can order fun, tasty, sanitary, and highly novel snacks from a bar menu.

TEAM:

Eric Groft, CEO, Brewery Consultant www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=1535220 Dave Silver, MBA, Consumer Packaged Goods – Food & Beverage Executive www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=3813291 Natalia Postnova, MBA, Financial Analyst www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=14795051 Eric Melin, Startup Guy, Serial Entrepreneur www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=1902231 Jeffery Hart, Attorney & CPA, Tarlow Breed Hart & Rodgers, P.C. www.tbhr-law.com/bios/hart.html

Together the team has a wealth of start-up and consumer product experience. Prior clients include Marriott & Starwood hotel chains with experience closing numerous 6-figure deals. Executive experiences includes Product Marketing management for several Fortune 500 consumer products at multinational Procter & Gamble and Private Equity-owned beverage Brands. International leadership experience, extensive food business experience, extensive tax & legal experience, multiple languages and educational disciplines represented on the team.

VENTURE STAGE: Prototype Available on Request. Trademarks Set. 10,000 units currently in production.

MARKET: Our product addresses a snack food market of $29 Billion in the USA. Restaurant menu items aimed at “snackers” have increased 170% in the last three years.

CAPITALIZATION: Venture Financing. No Debt. No Revenue.

CAPITAL NEEDED: $20,000 Seed Capital for Proof Of Concept & Test Marketing.

FINANCING PLAN: $2000 from ~10 Series-Seed Investors. Future $2 Million Series A round.

EXIT STRATEGY: Acquisition by a Diversified Consumer Products Firm within 36 months.

CONTACTS:

Eric Melin, Founder eric@425cheeses.com (617) 500-3458 mobile
